_documentation.overview: Controls the world map display and teleportation waypoint system.
_documentation.map_system: Shows explored chunks with color coding by biome type and danger level.
_documentation.waypoint_system: Players unlock waypoint slots as they level. Spawn is always waypoint #1.
_documentation.persistence: Map and waypoint data are saved with the character in the main save file.

map_display._comment: Controls how the map UI renders explored areas
map_display._default_zoom_effects: HIGHER = zoomed in (larger chunks). LOWER = zoomed out (see more area).
map_display._min_zoom_effects: Minimum zoom level (most zoomed out). LOWER = can see more chunks.
map_display._max_zoom_effects: Maximum zoom level (most zoomed in). HIGHER = more detail on fewer chunks.
map_display._zoom_step_effects: How much zoom changes per scroll wheel tick.
map_display._chunk_render_size_effects: Base pixel size per chunk at zoom=1.0. HIGHER = larger chunks on map.
map_display._show_grid_effects: TRUE = show grid lines between chunks. FALSE = seamless map.
map_display._show_coordinates_effects: TRUE = show chunk coordinates on hover. FALSE = cleaner look.
map_display._show_player_marker_effects: TRUE = show player's current location. FALSE = hide player position.
map_display._show_waypoint_markers_effects: TRUE = show waypoint icons on map. FALSE = hide waypoints from map.
map_display._center_on_player_effects: TRUE = map opens centered on player. FALSE = map opens centered on spawn.

biome_colors._comment: RGB colors for each biome type on the map. Format: [R, G, B]
biome_colors._note: Colors are modified by danger level: peaceful=base, dangerous=darker, rare=highlighted
biome_colors._rare_hidden_forest_color: Lime green with glow - rare magical forest
biome_colors._unexplored_color: Very dark gray - chunks not yet visited
biome_colors._spawn_area_color: Gold border - marks the spawn chunk

marker_icons._comment: Configuration for map markers (player, waypoints, dungeons)

player._size_effects: Pixel size of the player marker. HIGHER = more visible.

waypoint._show_label_effects: TRUE = show waypoint name on map. FALSE = just icon.

dungeon._shape_note: skull renders as a small skull icon

waypoint_system._comment: Controls teleportation waypoint unlocking and limits

spawn_waypoint._always_available_effects: TRUE = spawn is always waypoint slot 1. FALSE = spawn must be unlocked.
spawn_waypoint._position_note: World coordinates [x, y] - spawn is at origin

unlock_schedule._comment: Which levels unlock additional waypoint slots. Array index = slot number (0-indexed after spawn).
unlock_schedule._note: Spawn is slot 0 (always free). These are slots 1-6.

waypoint_system._max_waypoints_effects: Maximum number of waypoints a player can have. Includes spawn.
waypoint_system._teleport_cooldown_effects: Seconds between teleports. HIGHER = longer wait. LOWER = faster travel.

teleport_cost._enabled_effects: TRUE = teleporting costs resources/mana. FALSE = free teleport.

placement_rules._require_solid_ground_effects: TRUE = can only place waypoints on walkable tiles. FALSE = anywhere.
placement_rules._min_distance_effects: Minimum tiles between waypoints. Prevents clustering. 0 = no limit.
placement_rules._blocked_in_dungeons_effects: TRUE = cannot place/use waypoints inside dungeons. FALSE = allowed.
placement_rules._blocked_in_combat_effects: TRUE = cannot teleport while enemies are nearby. FALSE = can flee.

waypoint_naming._allow_emoji_effects: TRUE = allow emoji in names. FALSE = alphanumeric only.

persistence._comment: How map and waypoint data is saved
persistence._save_explored_chunks_effects: TRUE = remember which chunks were visited. FALSE = map resets on load.
persistence._save_with_character_effects: TRUE = map data in main save file. FALSE = separate map file.
persistence._chunk_data_format_options: coordinates_only (just x,y), full (includes biome type cached)

ui_settings._waypoint_panel_width_note: Width of waypoint list sidebar in map UI
ui_settings._background_color_note: [R, G, B, A] - semi-transparent dark background

keybindings._comment: Default keys for map/waypoint actions (can be remapped in settings)
keybindings._place_waypoint_note: Key to place waypoint at current location (when map closed)
keybindings._center_on_player_note: Key to re-center map on player (when map open)
